original_title: Fairies: Music and Stories from Fairyland
overview: Celebrated illustrator Shirley Barber brings to life her magically beautiful fairies for this brand-new series overflowing with whimsically charming stories, entertaining and interactive games and animated sing-alongs from the magical kingdom of Fairyland. Children will enjoy the opportunity to interact with the fanciful fairies, whose playful and enchanting nature is both soothing and spirited.
title: Fairies: Music and Stories from Fairyland
